alert.note: Alert for Falls; Freestone; Limestone; Milam; Robertson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 02 at 7:37PM CST until March 02 at 8:45PM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Freestone County in central Texas... Robertson County in central Texas... Milam County in central Texas... Limestone County in central Texas... Falls County in central Texas... * Until 845 PM CST. * At 737 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Bellmead to near Coupland, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Marlin, Rockdale, Cameron, Hearne, Groesbeck, Teague, Mart, Franklin, Bruceville-Eddy, Rosebud, Thorndale, Calvert, Bremond, Lott, Golinda, Buckholts, Alcoa Lake, Twin Oak Reservoir, Fort Parker State Park and Lake Limestone. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 313 and 314. Interstate 45 near mile marker 191. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for central Texas. For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
